summary: This code sets up a bash language server using the bash-language-server command and redirects its output, error, and input to separate log files for logging purposes. It is compatible with rcshell only.

details.comment: This code sets up a bash language server using the bash-language-server command and redirects its output, error, and input to separate log files for logging purposes. It is compatible with rcshell only.
details.content:
#!/bin/rc
#tee -a bash_lsp_input.log | bash-language-server start 2>(tee -a bash_lsp_error.log 1>&2) 1>(tee -a bash_lsp_output.log)
# rcshell only.
tee -a bash_lsp_stdin.log | bash-language-server start
